function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited scope of literature review may lead to oversight of important information regarding COVID-19 transmission in office environments.","Impact":"Failure to account for all relevant information may result in ineffective measures to contain the spread of COVID-19 in offices.","Mitigation":"Conduct a comprehensive literature review that includes a wide range of sources and databases to ensure all relevant information is considered.","Technologies":"Data analysis and literature review software to efficiently gather and analyze a large volume of scientific literature.","People":"Office occupants, visitors, and employees who may be at risk of COVID-19 transmission in office environments.","Owner":"Research team, public health authorities, and policymakers responsible for implementing measures to contain the spread of COVID-19 in office environments."},{"Description":"Reliance on information from blog sites may introduce bias or inaccuracies in the understanding of COVID-19 transmission and prevention in office environments.","Impact":"Inaccurate or biased information may lead to the implementation of ineffective or inappropriate measures to contain the spread of COVID-19 in offices.","Mitigation":"Verify information from blog sites with scientific literature and expert consensus to ensure accuracy and reliability.","Technologies":"Fact-checking tools and databases for verifying information from blog sites.","People":"Readers, policymakers, and decision-makers who rely on the information from the study for implementing COVID-19 prevention measures in office environments.","Owner":"Research team, public health authorities, and policymakers responsible for implementing measures to contain the spread of COVID-19 in office environments."},{"Description":"Incomplete understanding of SARS-CoV-2 transmission dynamics and preventive measures in office settings may lead to inadequate protection against COVID-19 transmission.","Impact":"Inadequate protection measures may result in increased risk of COVID-19 transmission among office occupants and visitors.","Mitigation":"Engage with experts in infectious diseases and public health to gain a comprehensive understanding of SARS-CoV-2 transmission dynamics and effective preventive measures in office environments.","Technologies":"Remote collaboration tools for consulting experts and exchanging knowledge on SARS-CoV-2 transmission dynamics and preventive strategies.","People":"Office occupants, visitors, and employees who may be at risk of COVID-19 transmission in office environments.","Owner":"Research team, public health authorities, and policymakers responsible for implementing measures to contain the spread of COVID-19 in office environments."}]}
